AutoUpdateTokens.Name: Auto Update Token Heights
AutoUpdateTokens.Hint: Automatically update token elevations when they move to different height grids

OverlayOpacity.Name: Height Overlay Opacity
OverlayOpacity.Hint: Opacity of the height number overlay (0-1)

DefaultBrushHeight.Name: Default Brush Height
DefaultBrushHeight.Hint: Default height value for the brush tool

BrushDisplayVisible.Name: Show Brush Display
BrushDisplayVisible.Hint: Show the on-canvas brush height display when in edit mode

KeyboardShortcuts.Name: Enable Keyboard Shortcuts
KeyboardShortcuts.Hint: Enable keyboard shortcuts for adjusting brush height (Arrow keys, +/-)

DataManagementMenu.Name: Data Management
DataManagementMenu.Label: Manage Height Data
DataManagementMenu.Hint: Import, export, or clear height data for the current scene

Controls.KeyboardHint: Use arrow keys and +/- to adjust height

Tooltips.AddException: Add selected token(s) to exception list
Tooltips.ExportData: Export height data to JSON file
Tooltips.ImportData: Import height data from JSON file

ExceptionManagement.Title: Manage Flying Units
ExceptionManagement.TokenAddedToList: {tokenName} added to flying units exception list

ClearConfirm.Title: Clear All Heights
ClearConfirm.Content: Are you sure you want to clear all grid heights? This action cannot be undone.

DataManagement.Title: Map Height Data Management
DataManagement.Description: Manage height data for the current scene

Export.Description: Save height data to a JSON file

Import.Description: Load height data from a JSON file

Clear.Description: Remove all height data (cannot be undone)

Help.Title: How to Use
Help.Step1: Click "Height Edit Mode" to activate editing
Help.Step2: Select a brush height from the toolbar
Help.Step3: Click on grid squares to set their height
Help.Step4: Tokens will automatically update their elevation
Help.Step5: Add flying units to the exception list to prevent auto-updates

Notifications.InvalidHeight: Invalid height value. Must be between -1000 and 1000.
Notifications.TokenExceptionAdded: Token added to flying units exception list
Notifications.TokenExceptionRemoved: Token removed from flying units exception list

KeyboardShortcuts.Title: Keyboard Shortcuts
KeyboardShortcuts.Hint: Keyboard shortcuts only work when height edit mode is active and no input field is focused.

RectangleFill.FirstPointSelected: First corner selected. Hold Shift and click another grid to fill rectangle.
RectangleFill.RectangleFilled: Rectangle area filled with current brush height.
RectangleFill.Hint: Hold Shift and click two grids to fill a rectangular area
